FuncDef:
The isis small-hello command configures an interface to send small-sized Hello packets without the padding field.
The undo isis small-hello command cancels the configuration. The isis small-hello command configures an interface to send small-sized Hello packets without the padding field. The undo isis small-hello command cancels the configuration. By default, no small Hello packet with no padding field is configured on an interface.
